simulator.payloads

Class OverrideMessageFaultModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • simulator.framework.Logger
      • simulator.payloads.OverrideMessageFaultModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NetworkFaultModel

    public class OverrideMessageFaultModel
extends Logger
implements NetworkFaultModel
    Overrides a specific message type with the payload value specified at creation time.

    • Method Detail

      • registerNetworkScheduler

        public void registerNetworkScheduler(NetworkScheduler ns)
        Description copied from interface: NetworkFaultModel
        Give the fault model a reference to the network scheduler. This allows it to call the fault interface methods, such as isMessagePending and dropCurrentMessage.
        Specified by:
        registerNetworkScheduler in interface NetworkFaultModel
        Parameters:
        ns - The network scheduler this fault model is registered with.

      • canStart

        public boolean canStart(Payload payload)
        Description copied from interface: NetworkFaultModel
        Notify the fault model that a message is starting
        Specified by:
        canStart in interface NetworkFaultModel
        Parameters:
        payload - Message that is starting

      • canDeliver

        public boolean canDeliver(Payload payload)
        Description copied from interface: NetworkFaultModel
        Ask fault model if the message can be delivered
        Specified by:
        canDeliver in interface NetworkFaultModel
        Parameters:
        payload - Message to be delivered
        Returns:
        true if the message can be delivered
